column5: I have been watching the weather on the web lately and saw that up around Sioux Lookout they were supposed to get rain for 3 or 4 days in row last week or so. Just curious if anyone knows if they did. If so, did it bring the water levels up at all???thanks
My source in Perrault Falls told me they had a light rain last friday,it just soaked in.
I talked with the owner at the camp I go to on Monday. Water levels are 3-4 feet lower than last year there. I go to a camp about 30 miles south of Pickle Lake. Good Luck!!
Thats better than the 5-6 feet lower than normal i heard a few weeks ago!good luck to everyone
